thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Jose mendoza
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Jose mendoza

author: Jose mendoza
title: Jose mendoza
text:
For years I have been buying things through Internet, and I hate it sometimes. It gets me where I do not need to go, but I’m tired of visiting online shop all the time. It's annoying that I have to spend so many times in order to buy different electronic gadgets. Even when they had been so dispersed. I know now in a few seconds I’ll just end up buying everything in one place, Tomtop online shop.
I have finally decided that I am not going to visit many online shops anymore. I have decided to buy only in Tomtop. Something economical? I have so many choices that I don’t even know where to begin. I am not sure if I will be able to make the decision on my own. I don't have a lot of money either, so I probably don't have many options but I will get what I want.
